name: Racing Repairs
description:
This game is a Racing Game made for the Global Game Jam 2020

Thème : Repair

During the race,  car composants will be used and loose durability, so you have to get items (wheel for this prototype), to repair it and continue the race with all your power.

We can play both single or 2 player.

Control : QASD or Arrows (player 2 only)

Credits :
